item.title: Count the Code
item.description: Measure the execution time Measuring the execution time of a script or program is part of a developer’s daily job. It is not enough to see if it consumes too much memory or too much CPU. We need to see if the software in its entire life cycle is fast enough. This is because the business logic of any software expects a certain task to be completed with a maximum time established by the programmer himself.
